docs.title: MkLorum
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. site_name: MkLorum

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Data Storytelling Clustering Example
docs.text: This page demonstrates clustering functionality using vis.js for data storytelling.

docs.title: Fast Face Detection Simulation
docs.text: This demo detects faces in an uploaded image quickly using a lightweight model.

docs.title: Instructions
docs.text:
1. Upload an image.
  2. Detected faces will be highlighted with bounding boxes.
Upload an image to start...

docs.title: KNN Classification Simulator
docs.text: This simulator dynamically classifies data points using the KNN algorithm. Adjust k to see how the decision boundary changes.

docs.title: Controls
docs.text:
Number of Neighbors (k): 3

Generate New Data

docs.text: This simulation shows how the slope, intercept, and noise level affect a regression line and the data points.

docs.title: Adjust Parameters
docs.text: Slope: 1 Intercept: 0 Noise Level: 2

docs.title: Understanding Tokenization
docs.text: Tokenization is the process of breaking down text into smaller units like words or sentences. This is a fundamental step in natural language processing (NLP).

docs.title: Tokenization Simulation
docs.text:
This interactive demo shows how tokenization works with different modes (word, sentence, and token-level embeddings). Modify the text or select a mode to see the visualization.

Select Mode: Word Tokenization Sentence Tokenization Token-Level Embeddings

docs.title: Word Cloud Simulator
docs.text: Visualize the most frequent words in your text as a word cloud.
